person.content:
Please identify the "Person" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Led as usual by Swede Kennet Andersson and Russian Igor Kolyvanov in attack , Bologna can expect a tough home match against a Piacenza side still exultant after a 3-2 league win over AC Milan last Sunday .

Let's think step by step.

| Person |
|--------|
| Swede Kennet Andersson |
| Russian Igor Kolyvanov |
| Bologna (implied: unspecified Bologna players and coaching staff) |
| Piacenza (implied: unspecified Piacenza players and coaching staff) |
| AC Milan (implied: AC Milan players and coaching staff) |

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

|--------|

| Russian Igor Kolyvanov |

| Piacenza (Piacenza players and coaching staff) |
